Summary.title: Summary
Summary.intro1: Here you will find a detailed summary of your salary — how much tax goes to the state, how much you actually receive, and how much your work costs the employer.
Summary.intro2: In Estonia, the salary structure can seem complex: social tax, pension contributions, unemployment insurance, and income tax — all of these affect your final amount.
Summary.beforeList: After the calculation you will know:

list.netSalary: the net salary that you receive on your account;
list.taxes: the amount of taxes withheld from you and paid by your employer;
list.totalCost: the total cost of your work for the company.
